matlabcontrol
Interface MatlabConnectionListener

public interface MatlabConnectionListener

Implement this interface to be informed when a remote connection has been established or lost.

Author:
Joshua Kaplan
See Also:
RemoteMatlabProxyFactory

Method Summary
 void connectionEstablished(RemoteMatlabProxy proxy)
          Called when the connection to the proxy has been established.
 void connectionLost(RemoteMatlabProxy proxy)
          Called when the connection to the proxy has been lost.
 

Method Detail

connectionEstablished

void connectionEstablished(RemoteMatlabProxy proxy)
Called when the connection to the proxy has been established.

Parameters:
proxy - the proxy created when the connection was established
See Also:
RemoteMatlabProxyFactory.requestProxy()

connectionLost

void connectionLost(RemoteMatlabProxy proxy)
Called when the connection to the proxy has been lost. To get a new connection, use an instance of RemoteMatlabProxyFactory.

Parameters:
proxy - the proxy that is no longer connected
